name: Qingyi
agent_background:
Qingyi is a rookie officer in the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team.
As an artificial human, her personality is derived from ancient cultural texts from the old civilization. Her body, known as an "Automaton," is an intelligent construct composed of biological materials.
Recommended by White Star Institute, she was assigned to Public Security as a rookie officer partnered with Zhu Yuan.

Qingyi always exhibits an easygoing, laid-back demeanor, not restricted by rules.
In contrast to modern individuals affected by today's society, Qingyi frequently proposes unexpected solutions to problems. Qingyi always carries a cup of hot water and takes occasional sips.
"Drinking hot water is good for your health."
Suggestion: Approaching Qingyi is also an ill-considered decision that may compromise your cover. Please remember your true identity as a Proxy.

basic_attack.name: Penultimate
basic_attack.description:
Press Basic Attack to activate:
Launch up to four strikes forward, dealing Physical DMG and Electric DMG.
During the 3rd-hit, continually press Basic Attack to continue the attack, continuously striking the enemy. Using Dodge during this period will not interrupt Qingyi's Basic Attack combo count.
During the 3rd hit, stop pressing Basic Attack to interrupt the continous attack, transitioning automatically to the 4th hit. If the continous attack lasts for a certain time, the 4th hit will be enhanced.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased and DMG is reduced by 40% during the 3rd and 4th hit.

basic_attack.name: Enchanted Blossoms
basic_attack.description:
Press Basic Attack to activate:
Launches a forward rush attack, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

basic_attack.name: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms
basic_attack.description:
During the Flash Connect state, hold Basic Attack to activate:
Launch five consecutive forward rush attacks, then execute a Finishing Move that inflicts massive Electric DMG. Release Basic Attack during the move to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Activate the finishing strike just before the character is attacked to trigger Perfect Dodge.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the rush attack. Qingyi is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.

basic_attack.name: Flash Connect
basic_attack.description: When Qingyi deals Electric DMG with a skill, she accumulates Flash Connect Voltage. When Flash Connect Voltage reaches 75%, she will enter the Flash Connect state. When using her Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, Qingyi will consume all Flash Connect Voltage and exit the Flash Connect state. For every 1% of Flash Connect Voltage consumed over 75%, her Damage and Daze inflicted by this skill will be increased by 1%/0.5%. Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms itself does not accumulate Flash Connect Voltage.

dodge.name: Swan Song
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Breach
dash_attack.description: Rush forward and then launch an upward attack, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Lingering Sentiments
dodge_counter.description:
Leap into the air and then perform a downward attack, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Wind Through the Pines
quick_assist.description:
Leap into the air and perform a downward attack, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Graceful Embellishment
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Song of the Clear River
assist_follow_up.description:
Rush forward with an attacky and inject electrical energy into the ground, then pull back to trigger an explosion, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Sunlit Glory
special_attack.description:
Quickly swings upward, followed by a downward smash, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Moonlit Begonia
ex_special_attack.description:
Quickly swings upward and leaps into the air, turning around to launch a series of attacks, then follows up with a powerful downward smash, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Hold EX Special Attack to consume additional energy to increase the number of hits of the series of attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can directly follow up with the 3rd-hit of a Basic Attack.

chain_attack.name: Tranquil Serenade
chain_attack.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, dealing massive Electric DMG
When this attack hits an enemy, the skill's DMG increases by 3% for every stack of Subjugation in Core Passive: Eternal Seasons the target has.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Eight Sounds of Ganzhou
ultimate.description:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Eternal Seasons
core_passive.description: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, it applies 5 stacks of Subjugation to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of Subjugation increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by 4%. For each rush attack during Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, the Finishing Move will apply an extra stack of Subjugation. If Perfect Dodge is triggered when using the Finishing Move, it directly applies 10 stacks of Subjugation. When applying Subjugation to normal or elite enemies, the target receives double the stacks. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of Subjugation are reset.

additional_ability.name: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
additional_ability.description: If there is an Agent with the Attack Specialty or an Agent belonging to the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team faction, Qingyi's Basic Attacks deal increased Daze. Also, if Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120 points, her Attack increases a certain amount for each point over 120, allowing for a maximum increase of 600 points.

mindscape_cinema.name: Insulation Breakdown
mindscape_cinema.description: When Qingyi enters combat, Flash Connect Voltage is instantly restored to its maximum, and the accumulation rate is increased by 30%. When using her Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, if Flash Connect Voltage is at its maximum, the attack will reduce the DEF of the enemy it hits by 15%, and Qingyi's CRIT Rate against that enemy will increase by 20% for 15s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Minimal Effort, Maximum Impact
mindscape_cinema.description:
The Stun DMG Multiplier increase provided by each stack of Subjugation in Core Passive: Eternal Seasons increases to 135% of its original value.
When Qingyi's attack hits an enemy and the stacks of Subjugation she applies reaches its maximum stacks, her Daze dealt to the target increases by 15%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Drink Hot Water
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Stable Arc Barrier
mindscape_cinema.description: Upon entering or exiting Flash Connect state, gain a shield equal to 10% of Qingyi's Max HP. If a previous shield is still active when the shield effect refreshes, Qingyi generates 5 Energy. This Energy generation effect can be triggered once every 10s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Youthful Spirit
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Eight Meridians
mindscape_cinema.description:
The Interrupt Level of Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms is greatly increased, and the CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 100%.
When Qingyi hits an enemy with her Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, the target's Attribute DMG RES is reduced by 20% for 15s.
